title: 怎么用命令方块重置信标效果啊
author: 冣後de轮迴

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
冣後de轮迴 发表于 2020-3-12 14:13
1.15.2的用作服务器里
/data modify block -177 4 -77 Primary set value 0

把位于 -177 4 -77 的信标的主效果设置为无

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
修改信标的 nbt 即可
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... 7.E5.AE.9E.E4.BD.93

replies.author: 冣後de轮迴
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: hyz207
replies.txt_content: 你可以范围内/effect ，不用信标也信，/effect指令具体用法：https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4/effect
